actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

actions.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

official_title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Flanders, New York.

summary.text: Requires the United States Postal Service (USPS) to designate a single, unique zip code applicable to the area encompassing only Flanders, New York.

titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Flanders, New York.
